titleSub.en-US: I’ve found Yellow to be an essential part of my business.

description.en-US:
If you’ve ever been frustrated with stereo instructions, tuning a TV, or have tried setting up a home entertainment system you’ll know that it can be a complex task. Fortunately help is at hand with Dennis and his team at __Home Tech Solutions__.

Dennis started his career in the Navy working with valve tubes and has been growing with new technologies ever since. The modern home environment has more digital products that need to be interconnected than ever, and over the years Dennis and the team have developed a can-do attitude to become experts in making the complex simple. From tuning your television, to full home automation, Home Tech Solutions have you covered.

With over 50 years of experience Dennis knows all about the challenges of owning and running a small business. When starting out, Home Tech Solutions needed help with advertising and marketing - and Yellow were there to answer this need with the Yellow Pages. Now, 50 years on, Home Tech Solutions recognise the need to advertise in a digital environment and Yellow have been there every step of the way, evolving with him. 

Yellow allows Dennis to do what he does best, making sure his marketing requirements are taken care of and that they’re working hard to drive new customers. He uses a combination of print advertising in the Yellow Pages, has an online presence with a website, and drives relevant traffic through Google Adwords. By partnering with Yellow he’s able to bring all his marketing together to deliver the best results for his business. 

Dennis and his team are passionate about making the complex simple and are there to help guide you through your next project. To get an insight into what you can do in your home get in touch with Home Tech Solutions today.

seoTitle.en-US: Second 2 None) - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: Yellow have helped move us along with the times.

description.en-US:
__Second 2 None__ furniture moving specialists are a local and family run business. Whether it’s negotiating large heavy items or delicately shifting a fish tank, from the very first phone call or email with owners Joe and Tracey, you can feel their genuine desire to make moving as stress free as possible.

Running the business for over 20 years, the husband and wife team know the moving business in and out, but recognized early on that marketing would be key to business success and was something they lacked knowledge to do on their own. 

A long-standing relationship with Yellow as their marketing partner has ensured they can focus on what they do best whilst utilizing the expertise of Yellow to keep them on track and moving with the times. 

Second 2 None’s marketing has evolved from what was once just an ad in the Yellow Pages, to a broader mix which now includes online advertising too. They’ve found this helps them to cover off the broad customer base they have, whilst still being able to ensure their marketing is working hard at a targeted local level. 

Joe, Tracey know that moving isn’t just about taking objects from one place to another. They feel privileged to help their customers move their lives and memories and have a team of local staff who strive to make moving a hassle-free event.

seoTitle.en-US: Masterbuilt - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: They helped set us up and guide us along the way.

description.en-US:
__Masterbuilt__, owned and operated by Paddy and Kathy O’Donnell has been around for 26 years but the experience spans an almost 40-year career in building excellence. 

The couple’s son James is also involved in the business, he brings fresh ideas and shares his parents drive for quality.  

Happy customers are their number one priority and it’s been critical to the company’s long-standing success. The team’s business ethos is about fostering strong relationships both with clients and preferred sub-contractors to ensure a quality outcome. Masterbuilt has passion and experience for all new builds, renovations and commercial building projects.

When it came to marketing, they were struggling against a tide of new advertising and unsure what to do and how. They had been using the Yellow book, but with new digital solutions available, Yellow helped to guide them with how to get the best out of digital marketing too. 

Masterbuilt has a combination of Yellow solutions, including the Yellow book, a website and an ongoing Google Ads campaign. The mixture of offline and online advertising tools ensures they have their bases covered wherever their customers are searching. 

Knowing that the digital landscape is ever-changing, Masterbuilt rely on their partnership with Yellow to guide, keep them up to date and show them the results they’re getting along the way.

seoTitle.en-US: Marlborough Turf Professionals - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: Marlborough Customer Story: Marlborough Turf Professionals

titleSub.en-US: We’ve had a really good relationship with Yellow and have had from the start.

description.en-US:
__Marlborough Turf Professionals__ have been providing specialist lawn and turf management since 1992 and covers the entire Marlborough region to as far as Kaikoura. Main services include, hydroseeding, hydromulching, instant turf, synthetic turf for easy care, irrigation, water features and planting from design to completed landscape work.

MTP is a trusted and respected name in the area with their work and many lawns and landscapes of local businesses and households carried by them.

Linda Crouch, who has been the Office Manager for the past 15 years, says MTP pride themselveson the good customer feedback coming to the office from the great work they do. This is important as the focus is moving the business forward and bringing on new clients.

This wasn’t always easy, as one of the bigchallenges they had was getting their nameout there for potential customers to see what they do and the  services they offer. 

Linda acknowledges that Yellow has played a huge part in bringing new business to them in helping them grow over the years. 

Through MTP’s partnership with Yellow in their early days where they started with their Print Display ads in the Yellow Pages section, they have since hopped online with Yellow’s Online and Digital offerings.

Linda mentions their most recent addition of Google Search ads “has just been awesome and made it really easy for people to get a hold of us.” From this avenue, they get about 15 to 20 new leads a month from the Google Search Ads.

name.en-US: Customer Story: Taranaki (The Mad Irish Keyman)

seoTitle.en-US: The Mad Irish Keyman - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: Taranaki Customer Story: The Mad Irish Keyman

titleSub.en-US: The biggest thing in business is to keep at it, head down, bum up, but if you want to move ahead you’ve got to do something about it.

description.en-US:
If you’ve ever been locked out of your car or home then you’ve likely had the pleasure of meeting Des O’Neill, __The Mad Irish Keyman__.

Running a local business from Devon Street in New Plymouth for the last 25 years, Des knows all about the challenges of owning and running a business.

His shop has all your key cutting and shoe repair needs sorted, you may have also seen his fully-equipped key van cruising the streets. Equipped with everything from lost and replacement keys to auto entry and programming services, the mobile part of his business is bringing innovation to a traditional industry. This dedication to staying current has seen his business grow and Yellow has been a strong ally during his journey.

Marketing is important, and with more and more people using their phones digital solutions have become an important tool in helping to attract new customers. Des has a pragmatic approach to helping his business thrive - *“The biggest thing in business is to keep at it, head down, bum up, but if you want to move ahead you’ve got to do something about it.”*

The Mad Irish Keyman utilises a combination of traditional advertising using the Yellow Pages, as well as digital marketing solutions including Yellow’s webspace service, Yellow Profile, and Google AdWords.

Running a business and servicing customers is a full time job. By partnering with Yellow he’s able to bring it all together to deliver the best results for his business and give him time to get on with his day.

Des and his team are passionate about providing quality service at honest prices to the local community. So whether you require their mobile van service or are visiting them in store, you can expect friendly customer service from their knowledgeable staff.

name.en-US: Customer Story: Southern Lakes (Septic Tank Services)

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: Southern Lakes Customer Story: Septic Tank Services

titleSub.en-US: Yellow provide us with value.

description.en-US:
__Septic   Tank   Services__ has   been running in the Central Lakes area since 2012. Their expertise lies in commercial, corporate or small industry septic tank services. More recently they’ve added luxury loo hire to their offer.

With the ability to cover a large geographic area throughout Central   Lakes region, they provide service 24-7 with an understanding that this is a job that comes with emergencies and it’s necessary to operate with urgency for some jobs. 

In addition to septic tank cleaning other services on offer include  grease  trap cleaning, mud tank cleaning and luxury loo hire and cleaning. 

Being a busy owner-operator comes with its challenges and the classic conundrum of businesses like Aaron and Rochelle’s, is trying to juggle getting the job done, with the management and marketing of the business. 

> Yellow provide us with value.

Aaron and Rochelle have worked with Yellow since the beginning, recognizing they can’t do it all alone. “Yellow took the time to understand  our  business  and provide a solution which best fitted what we needed”. They were drawn to Yellow because of the breadth of service on offer from print, to online and the way it keeps the phone ringing. 

So whilst Aaron and Rochelle strive to be the best in the industry by  providing good service and customer  satisfaction, Yellow listens, consults and keeps the customers coming.

reference.en-US: Eastern Bays 2018 Customer Story: Beulah Services

titleSub.en-US: Yellow has been like a solid rock for us.

description.en-US:
__Beulah Services__ have worked hard over 25 years to build a family business and reputation for quality products and services, along with a consistently high level of customer service. They work on basically job that requires concrete, from small concrete slabs to large construction jobs and everything in between.  

A great example of a true family business, there’s several members of the family involved in the day to day running. Tammy and husband Jared are two of the family members helping to make the business a success. Working with Yellow to help get their business found through a long-standing relationship. 

The books are an integral part of their rural community, where customers still rely upon the books to find local providers. Covering off both print and online, Beulah Services has advertising in the Yellow books that covers their geographical area of operation. They also have a paid Yellow Profile to make sure customers can find them when searching online.   

The benefits of using a marketing partner like Yellow is the ability to hone in on the regional nuances and customer behavior in regional communities. Knowing that customers are able to search and find them, allows the team to get on with doing what they do best – all things concrete!  

With a broad range of services, their own concrete plant, this is a team geared up to help with any concrete job delivered with winning customer service.

seoTitle.en-US: BayVets - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: Business is about relationships, Yellow is one of these relationships.

description.en-US:
__BayVets__ currently consists of 3 clinics; Edgecumbe, Whakataneand Kawerau with an agency in Opotiki (Lowes Hire and Engineering). Originally part  of  the  Rangitaiki Plains Dairy Company, they  employed their first Vet Clinic in 1923. Following the Edgecumbe earthquakes in 1987, they decided to  split  the Vet side of the business away from the Dairy Company and BayVets was formed. 

It’s one of the largest privately-owned Vet practices serving Bay of Plenty,  offering high-quality veterinary care, complimented by a range of animal health products to their rural and urban clients.  

John Dillon is the Business Manager for the company. He’s been there for 19 years and it is apparent that he is passionate about business, serving their clients well and supporting their staff in a good work environment. Working alongside John is Travis Baxter, their Senior Vet and one of the Directors of the company. Travis has been at BayVets for 15 years, working with both large animal clients (farmer clients) and companion animal owners. 

Providing the best for their clients and staff, including their animals is  crucial for both John and Travis. Their  relationship with  Yellow started  approximately 30 years ago and plays a big part in their business success. Yellow has provided BayVets with a medium to connect with clients through a local and regional directory.  

Working with Yellow  has been flexible and efficient. For both John and Travis, business has always been about good relationships at all levels,  both internal and external. Working with Yellow has succeeded their   business relationship and marketing expectations.

seoTitle.en-US: QC Treework - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: It’s been good for me with Yellow.

description.en-US:
__QC Treeworks__ has a name that says it all, QC meaning ‘quality’ and ‘control’, a business dedicated to doing a top job with an excellent result. 

QC Treework offer specialised arborist solutions for residential and commercial, servicing the wider Coromandel Peninsula area. They do all sorts of tree related tasks from reducing, thinning, removing, stump grinding and chipping. 

Owner and Operator Hayden Smith has been in the business of trees for over 10 years and whilst climbing trees for a living is the ultimate job for him, he ensures the business has a strong focus on keeping its customers happy.

“I love customers telling me I’ve done a great job and there’s nothing broken, because there’s a lot of cowboys out there” he says. 

When it came to the marketing of his business, Hayden had been in the Yellow books for some time, but when he added an online listing and a website, business picked up. The partnership he has with Yellow means he has a trusted resource to help him with being found by his customers in print and now online too. 

Getting found is such a key part of business success and the solutions Yellow provide are focused on making that happen. There’s a variety of ways to raise a business’s profile to be found, depending on where they’re located and where their customers are.

seoTitle.en-US: Blueprints - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: Advertising with Yellow was an automatic step.

description.en-US:
John Gibbs has a wealth of knowledge in design and construction and with over 46 years of experience he’s seen a thing or two in this vastly changing industry. 

__Blueprints__ provides a breadth of services that aims to walk anybody through the correct steps for constructing a building. Whether it’s initial planning, resource  consents, creative  design, through to site analysis, the team pride themselves on great service and high standard of work. 

John enjoys the challenges that come with the job, he knows he’s good at  what he  does and says the variety or work that comes through his door keeps the grey matter working. “I enjoy it because it’s creative, challenging and I’m always meeting new people”. 

When it came to marketing the business John says advertising with Yellow was an automatic step. “In a service industry in a small town, people may  know the name of your business but they turn to places like Yellow to find out how to get in contact”. 

Through his partnership with Yellow, Blueprints have a combination of marketing solutions including a long-standing presence in the Yellow books which works well alongside a Yellow website.  

Yellow have made it easy for John to specialize in what he does best – working with his clients to bring their vision to life, while his business is being found where his customers are looking.

seoTitle.en-US: Hale Electrical - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

titleSub.en-US: You’d want a pretty good reason not to use Yellow because if you’re looking to expand your business, that’s where the majority of people look.

description.en-US:
Jonathan, a Rotorua local since 2001, started __Hale Electrical__ in 2007  as  an electrical inspector carrying out work for residential, commercial and industrial markets. The business has since grown and diversified into completing electrical work in other fields including refrigeration, air conditioning and solar installations.

The company strives to not only achieve customer satisfaction, but also   work satisfaction for their staff, hence their mission to be the benchmark  in  professionalism for all electricians in the local area. Maintaining a good reputation and creating a high working standard for staff is important as Jonathan states, “At the end of the day, customers can see that we’ve got pride in our work”.

Jonathan recognises that even just 12 years  ago, the place to be found was still mainly offline in the Yellow Pages  book  but now more information  has  shifted online. His full colour print Display Ads and Yellow Online priority listings in a range of suitable categories has ensured he is founded in  the  right  targeted search whether it be an ‘Electrician’ or ‘Solar Energy   Equipment’ or ‘Home Appliance Servicing’ in the area.

Hale  Electrical is a great example of a business utilising the network  of  Yellow to be found by existing and potential customers. Regardless  of being found online or offline, Jonathan appreciates that it still needs to  be easy for a range of people searching for his services to where to find him and how to contact him.

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: Whanganui Customer Story: GARYZ Services Ltd

titleSub.en-US: Just give Yellow a call and they will help with your marketing solutions.

description.en-US:
Since a young age, Gary Clark has been a lover of insects! Gary  caught  the  ‘bug’ back in 1987 when  he started working part-time as a pest technician. Shortly after he got his “Pest Management NZ” certificate and started a full-fledged business in 1993.

__GARYZ Services Ltd__ have since been working hard to keep the Whanganui   heritage clean, by preventing pests inside households. Always striving for excellence, the team provide ongoing maintenance of pest control to the   highest possible standards ensuring a job well done – every time. Working  across residential, commercial, all the way from local restaurants, to the  Whanganui Museum grounds! 

Gary  and his partner Krystine Davies recognised how complex marketing a business can be, especially when working around school hours and being out in the field. “Just give Yellow a call and they  will help with your marketing  solutions”, and that’s exactly what they did. Yellow and GARYZ Services Ltd have been on a marketing journey together for 25 years and counting. 

> Just give Yellow a call and they will help with your marketing solutions.

They both understand how important it is to adapt, especially in the digital world. With the help of Yellow, they have a website up and running, alongside a Yellow online profile and are in the books.  

They are very satisfied to see how his business brand image has thrived, through the success of Yellow advertising and word of mouth. Yellow’s  strong understanding of the market has given them a constant flow of customer and they’ve seen an increase in calls for new jobs. 

Working with Yellow was a no brainer. They loved how simple the journey has been and have seen the results.

seoTitle.en-US: Eastland Veterinary Services - Customer Story | Yellow® NZ

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: Gisborne Customer Story: Eastland Veterinary Services

title.en-US:
__John Meban and Tina Orsler__
Eastland Veterinary Services

titleSub.en-US: Having a presence with Yellow is being able to provide a service above expectation.

description.en-US:
__Eastland Vets__ offers a wide range of medical and surgical services, including disease prevention and animal health planning, horse dentals and  much more. Whether it’s treating your beloved pet, on-farm calls or  assisting in conservation work for DOC, all are catered for at Eastland  Veterinary Services.

Directors John Meban and Tina Orsler are proud to own a business that has been locally owned and operated for over 30 years. Their two clinics in Gisborne and  Wairoa cover a large geographical area, ensuring they can  provide a high quality of animal care to the community from Tutira to  Hicks Bay, Mahia to Matawai. 

Connecting with the community through Yellow completes the circle of reaching  as much of the market as possible. A lot of movement in the community sees the constant need to reach out to new Gisborne residents and draw attention to the broad spectrum of services offered. Yellow meets Eastland Veterinary  Services niche marketing requirements.

Partnering with Yellow has allowed John, Tina and their team to focus  on  what they do best – providing professional animal health care for both domestic and farming clients. With a team of highly experienced veterinarians, veterinary nurses and support staff, Eastland Veterinary   Services ensure the best care for every animal, both large and small.

reference.en-US: Nelson and Bays Customer Story: Sports Therapy Physiotherapists Nelson

title.en-US:
__Candace Donovan and Chris Wahnig__
Sports Therapy Physiotherapists Nelson

titleSub.en-US: Yellow doesn’t put us in a box. They make  sure we are found in all the right places, with a good cross section of marketing solutions that work for us.

description.en-US:
As a group of private practitioners, the team at __Sports Therapy Physiotherapists__ Nelson are specialists in assessment, diagnosis and treatment of injuries. They also  help  with  movement and postural    dysfunction to resolve issues with weakness, injury or habitual problems. Their aim is to help their clients achieve optimal performance or health outcomes from their treatments. 

The business has been operating in Nelson for over 18 years and each and every member of the team work with the belief that if they put the client first, then  everything else  falls  into  place. The team’s passion for sport and the outdoors is evident from the first meeting. 

When it comes to marketing the business, they’ve built a solid relationship with Yellow to help them work out an approach that fits their business. 

Candace says they have been able to express themselves as individuals as there was no template to complete. “Yellow doesn’t put us in a box. They make  sure we are found in all the right places, with a good cross section of  marketing solutions that work for us”. 

Currently they advertise in the Yellow book, and invest in Google Ads. With a client base that spans all generations it’s important to have broad  reach  and flexibility. 

Throughout the partnership Candace has found Yellow to be open to making  adjustments, providing suggestions, able to adapt and keep at the forefront of digital technology. Knowing Yellow is on top of their marketing gives the team more time to focus on treating their clients.

name.en-US: Customer Story: North Canterbury and  Kaikoura (Scrapman)

seoDescription.en-US: Check out how Kiwi businesses are using Yellow as their go-to digital marketing partner.

reference.en-US: North Canterbury and Kaikoura Customer Story: Scrapman

titleSub.en-US: We’ve always been with Yellow and it’s always worked well for us. Always.

description.en-US:
Venturing out on their own, and with decades of experience, Mike and his  business partner in Bay of Plenty each opened a Scrapman branch seven years ago. 

Placing importance on  the customer experience, Mike and his skilled team of handling experts run a tight ship; their yard is tidy, safe and organized with superior equipment. 

Their friendly and helpful approach busts the myth that scrap metal yards are intimidating, and paying top  dollar for all forms of metal and machinery  means customers walk away happy. 

Growing quickly from 10 bins to 160+ Scrapman has kept the environment at the heart of their business, and taking pride in keeping New Zealand green.  Deeply entrenched in the Kaiapo community giving back is importantto Mike,  sponsoring local rugby teams and speedway. 

> We’ve always been with Yellow and it’s always worked well for us. Always.

As far as Mike is concerned if you’re not marketing with Yellow, you won’t  get  noticed. Scrapman’s marketing strategy has always been centered around Yellow’s offering, running a combination of both print and digital marketing tools to drive new customer through their doors. Scrapman have been with Yellow from day one and recognize the partnership has been part of their recipe for success. 

With Yellow taking care of his marketing Mike has more time to grow his business, and even get along to the speedway once in a while.
